bash
kubectl apply -n checkoutservice -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-checkoutservice-traffic
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: cartservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 7070

    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:

    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
  - from:
    - podSelector:

          app: emailservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 5000
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: paymentservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
EOF
